synopsis.text: Cephon Altera, known as Birdy, and her human counterpart, Tsutomu Senkawa, find themselves once again entangled in a web of interstellar intrigue. After the devastating Ryunka incident, a group of extraterrestrial convicts, with direct ties to the disaster, have escaped and found refuge on Earth. As Birdy juggles her responsibilities as a Federation Investigator and a popular celebrity, and Tsutomu navigates the challenges of a typical high school life, they are thrust into a new mission to apprehend these fugitives. However, they soon discover that they aren't the only ones in pursuit. An enigmatic assassin with a personal vendetta is also on the hunt, causing Birdy to reflect on her past and the people who shaped her. As the duo grapples with the complexities of their shared existence, they must also confront this unexpected crisis to prevent further chaos and unmask the mysterious assassin.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
